nodes.text: Wrestling slippers were a type of foot wear available by 20 BBY during the Clone Wars. The Human Republic soldiers Phow Ji and Usu Cley wore wrestling slippers during a Teräs Käsi match they fought. The match took place near Republic Mobile Surgical Unit 7 on the planet Drongar in the Outer Rim Territories while both were stationed their during the Battle of Drongar.
Wrestling slippers first appeared in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel in the MedStar Duology, written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry and published in 2004.
